title: Madam Speaker and the Minister for Health, Care and Business visit to Royal Navy Gibraltar Squadron

content.text: The Minister for Heath, Care and Business, the Hon Gemma Arias-Vasquez, and the Speaker of the Gibraltar Parliament, Judge Karen Ramagge visited Royal Navy Gibraltar Squadron yesterday, Tuesday 16 April.
They were greeted by Commander British Forces, Commodore Tom Guy, before been given a brief by Lieutenant Henry Kilby.
Shortly after the brief, the Minister and Madam Speaker were shown around the headquarters before going out to sea onboard HMS CUTLASS.
